Segregator - Interface in edu.ncsu.dre.engine
Segregator is the general term for all DRE components that can be used to divide an Artifact into a manageable/requisite pieces of information which can be provided to the ResearchScheduler for further research.
ServiceProvider - Interface in edu.ncsu.dre.engine
ServiceProvider is the general term for all DRE components that can be used to collect information on a subset of the artifact.
